description: This rubric evaluates the ability to determine the final positions of objects after a series of swaps. It assesses understanding of the sequence of swaps, attention to detail, and accuracy in determining outcomes.

scoring.true: The answer correctly corresponds to the given input.
scoring.false: The answer does not correctly correspond to the given input.

description: This rubric evaluates the ability to determine the final positions of objects after a series of swaps. It assesses understanding of the sequence of swaps, attention to detail, and accuracy in determining outcomes.

scoring.true: The response accurately reflects the correct answer based on the input.
scoring.false: The response does not accurately reflect the correct answer based on the input.

description: This rubric evaluates the ability to determine the final positions of objects after a series of swaps. It assesses understanding of the sequence of swaps, attention to detail, and accuracy in determining outcomes.

scoring.true: The answer is appropriate and correctly derived from the input.
scoring.false: The answer is inappropriate or incorrectly derived from the input.
